title: Learning Analytics-Based Customized Feedback Design: Support Strategies for Adult Learners in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social studies subjects and adaptability to online learning environments
context.additional_context: Social Field Non-Degree Course with Checkpoint Analysis-Based Feedback in a Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners can achieve a personal learning progress rate of over 80% through weekly checkpoint analysis
Learners can collect personalized learning advice at least twice weekly using the feedback system within the LMS
Learners can achieve an average proficiency score of 75+ by conducting three formative assessments on social studies topics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
